chat.msg: hi there, empezamos?
si
¡excelente! Veo una ramita que conduce a una pequeña isla con un tigre en ella.
¿Adónde debería ir ahora?
go around bushy trees with the parrot
ok, I'm walking around the leafy trees and I see a parrot
Where do I go next?
over the 2 rocas gris y 1 roca negra
i see, so i'm hopping over two gray rocks and one black rock, right? now i'm on a new island with a frog
what's next?
passing in between the frog and tree and turning right around over the crocodile
alright, maneuvered between the frog and the tree, and took a right around the crocodile
now, i'm on a larger island with an elephant again. what's next?
walk over 2 grey rocks on giraffe island
perfect, crossed over two gray rocks, now I'm on an island with a giraffe
pass through and over to snake island
okay, passed through giraffe island and now, i'm on snake island
what's the next move, friend?
go to treasure chest
aye aye, captain! walked two steps east and
ta-da, we hit the treasure! *finished*
hola, you ready?
yes
start by moving a few steps to your left, then head southwards
you should see a florist stand
yes
great, now take a quick u-turn on your left, cross that trail again, and go right back towards the white dog
yes
fantastic! now cross southwards over the branch
follow it straight down and be on the lookout for another white dog
I'm over the branch
spot on! continue your journey southwards, until you see another white dog sitting by a picnic
yes
alright, time to move again
go over that mat right there, brushing past the bowl of berries. and after that, take a left
yes
look out for another wooden branch and make your way back up, north over the river
can you see it?
ok
perfect! once you've crossed, watch out for a green bush and make a wide circle to its right
after that, you'll spot the florist stand again
At the florist stand
nice, now turn left and keep going until you spot a big bridge with two bikers on it
I'm at the bridge
excellent, keep heading west, passing the bridge
passed the bridge
well done! can you see those two elderly folks on a bench with newspapers?
yes
cool beans, now move a couple of steps south, between those wise folks and another wooden branch
Here by the branch
beautiful! go east now, the branch should be on one side and a bush on the other
ok
just a few more steps to the east now, keep an eye out for a brown young deer
ok
congrats, friend! you've made it
hope you enjoyed our little navigational adventure. see you on the next one!
hey, estas listo?
si
genial! ahora estoy en la carpa al norte del mapa
¿por donde debería ir?
en medio de un perro y una pared de rocas. hasta llegar a un trail
vale, veo al perro junto al fuego y las rocas más al sur
así que me dirijo al sur hacia el fuego y el perro, ¿correcto?
Get off the trail y around el fuego. Hasta llegar a los mushrooms por en frente
vale, asi que evito el fuego, sigo al sur hacia el hongo rojo
¿y luego que?
Vete al carro azul
entendido, ya estoy en camino al carro azul
¿y después?
Make a u turn and go on the trail that leads to the telescope
ok, 180 degrees turn
Walk IN between the telescope and a bush
alright, I'm going between the telescope and the bush
now where to?
para la piedras
entendido, voy hacia las rocas al oeste del telescopio ¿cierto?
ala casita de cabina\
ok, veo la casita de madera rodeada de rocas, camino hacia ella ahora
*finalizado*!
hey!!! ya comenzamos?
yes
alright, buddy! first things first, move southwest under the closest palm tree, then go right. you'll see another tree, pretty close
now crank it left before you hit the third tree, then stroll straight down south. let's go, explorer!
yes
great! now, you'll see a cute little brown puppy
steer left of it and then take a slight turn right to the south. you're doing awesome!
ok
now you're headed towards two rocks - one big and one small
stick with the middle path between them until you hit some water. let's go mermaid-mode!
ok
cool! okay, see the big crab? what we're gonna do now is swing a right and head west along that big rock, stay in the water though
onwards, captain!
ok
keep your eyes peeled for a medium rock and a shark in the water!
ok
right when you see the shark, make a hard right
keep it steady!
ok
nice! alright, now go back to dry land, following a path between that medium rock and a blue-yellow-white beach ball
head north!
ok
now veer slightly left and keep going to the north-west
you'll see a red tent and a large speaker, aim to go between them
ok
awesome! go around that tent in sort of an arc-shape, and then go south
sea's calling us back again!
ok
great stuff! just before you hit the water, go right
see that red kayak? head under that
ok
way to go! now take a sharp right turn and head north along the kayak
ok
you're almost there! your next target is a small green bush
keep going till you reach it. you're doing excellent!

When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I can't think of a word in the current language.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? It's an accident, or I don't realize I'm doing it.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.

general_survey.answer: At times it was confusing and had to read it over to understand

general_survey.answer: I speak both languages very naturally
